channel.title: Big Help
channel.description: I have purchased a VPS and setup all the stuff for my 317 PI server. I can connect to it with my laptop and my friends laptop from different houses but other people can only connect for 2 secs then lag out. Why?

item.title: Big Help
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

[quote=“iCreatedHorror, post:3, topic:396424”][quote author=Marine5287 link=topic=493593.msg3608850#msg3608850 date=1306366009]
Hey I’ve been noticing you posting this everywhere… I’m really sorry I have no experience with VPS. Good luck, and I hope someone helps you!
[/quote]
Hey, I notice you spam your useless comments.
@topic: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,474981.0.html
Keep it there and quit reposting.[/quote]

Relax I’m just being nice o.O
